scripts.build: if react-scripts build; then echo '😏 Build success'; else echo '😨 Build failure'; exit 1; fi
scripts.test: if CI=true react-scripts test --coverage --env=jsdom; then echo '✅ Unit test run success'; else echo '❌ Unit test run failure'; exit 1; fi
scripts.functional::online: if codeceptjs run --steps --config=./codecept/sauceHelper.config.js; then echo '🎊 Functional test run success'; else echo '💔 Functional test run failure'; exit 1; fi
scripts.functional::online:multiple: if codeceptjs run-multiple --all --steps --config=./codecept/sauceHelper.config.js; then echo '🎊 Functional test run success'; else echo '💔 Functional test run failure'; exit 1; fi
scripts.functional::online:localhost: export IS_TEST_LOCAL=true BASE_URL=http://localhost:3000/; npm run functional::online
scripts.deploy::prod: npm run build && gh-pages -d build && npm run delete::build
scripts.lint: if standard --fix | snazzy; then echo '💯 Lint perfect'; else echo '⁉️ Lint get error please run `npm run lint` check again';exit 1; fi
